review: So far, superb!!  I had been watching my Prime videos on an iPad, then on a Mac, but being able to watch shows on the big screen TV is great.  Works flawlessly with Amazon content, I believe the audio coming out is also far superior to Directv; video quality is at least as good.  I tried the Google dongle using Chrome but the video quality was standard definition at best.  I think for Amazon content, Fire is the best bang for the buck.
